correlation-index.description: An arbitrary numeric value used to identify the correlation ID used in request and response messages.

topic.description: The MQTT topic to which the message is published.

payload.description: The response payload UTF8 string, or null if no payload.

metadata.description: Keys and values of header fields in the message; a null value indicates field should not be present.

invoker-id.description: The invoker ID header property in the message.
